articles.description: PRINCE HARRY has been described as 'desperate for approval' by a royal commentator over his interviews with the US media.

articles.author: Rich Pelley
articles.title: Orbital: ‘We can’t fall out with each other for ever. It would make Christmas awkward’ - The Guardian
articles.description: The Glastonbury legends, returning with a new album, answer your questions on embarrassing festival memories, their breakup and makeup – and being mistaken for the Orb
articles.content:
Its Glastonbury this weekend. What do you remember of your legendary 1994 performance and why was it so important? Jamesis47
Paul Hartnoll: There we were, hammering it out on 909s and 303s [Rolands … [+7018 chars]

articles.author: Kaya Terry
articles.title: Glastonbury to be hit by THUNDERSTORMS and torrential rain as Met Office issues warning - Daily Mail
articles.description: Forecasters have put a yellow warning in place between 10am and 11.59pm today - with torrential downpours expected from Sheffield down to Somerset, where Glastonbury is held.
articles.content: Festivalgoers defied the national rail strikes crippling the UK's transport system, as well as threats of camping in torrential rain, and queued for replacement buses today in a bid to make it to Gla… [+8705 chars]
